metadata.title: Reid/Mantyla Data (PMEL EPIC)

creators.name: Oceanography, A. W. Mantyla at Scripps Institute of

metadata.description: These data have been accumulated for the purpose of global ocean studies and are not intended for fine scale analyses.  Each station represents, to our knowledge, the best station available for that locality at the time of the selection.
metadata.notes:
